dcterms:creator: J. T. Barron
B. Mildenhall
D. Verbin
P. P. Srinivasan
P. Hedman
dcterms:description: The Mip-NeRF360 dataset is used for evaluating novel view synthesis methods, providing a diverse set of scenes for testing the performance of 3D Gaussian representations.
dcterms:title: Mip-NeRF360 dataset

dcterms:creator: A. Knapitsch
J. Park
Q. Y. Zhou
V. Koltun
dcterms:description: The Tanks and Temples dataset is a benchmark for large-scale scene reconstruction, featuring various real-world scenes for evaluating 3D reconstruction methods.
dcterms:title: Tanks and Temples dataset

dcterms:creator: P. Hedman
J. Philip
T. Price
J. M. Frahm
G. Drettakis
G. Brostow
dcterms:description: The Deep Blending dataset is utilized for free-viewpoint image-based rendering, providing a set of scenes for testing blending techniques in 3D representations.
dcterms:title: Deep Blending dataset

dcterms:creator: B. Mildenhall
P. P. Srinivasan
M. Tancik
J. T. Barron
R. Ramamoorthi
R. Ng
dcterms:description: The NeRF-Synthetic dataset is designed for representing scenes as neural radiance fields, focusing on view synthesis tasks with synthetic scenes.
dcterms:title: NeRF-Synthetic dataset
